oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Information regarding //kunn was also given by /han=kasso (L VIII.-20. 7746-7749). |han=kass'o speaks of the rainmaker, ||kunn, (who he observed making rain fall) and his relations. 1) p.7745v: |han=kass'o had personally seen ||kunn make the rain fall, 2) p.7746v: details of ||kunn's relationship with |han=kass'o, 3) p.7748v: ||kunn had died by the time |han=kass'o returned from the Breakwater Convict Station, 4) See 'Oud Bakkis' or 'One Nose', 5) This story is found in Book VIII-20.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The rain sorcerer ||kunn; two of ||kunn's children
